ch.vorburger.webdriver.reporting

Class LoggingTestWatchman

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.TestWatchman
      • ch.vorburger.webdriver.reporting.LoggingTestWatchman
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.MethodRule

    public class LoggingTestWatchman
extends org.junit.rules.TestWatchman
    JUnit (v4) Rule which logs all test failures, starts, and ends. Used like this: 
     public static class WatchmanTest {

     @Rule
     public MethodRule logRule = new LoggingTestWatchman(...);

     @Test
     public void fails() {
         fail("I'm a loser baby, so why don't you kill me?");
     }
    This class should not have any or WebDriver or actual Report Writing dependencies/imports, only JUnit.
    Author:
    Michael Vorburger
